property.name: DOCUMENTORIGIN
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the illustration's page origin.

property.name: TOPLEFT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's top left corner.

property.name: LEFT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's left edge.

property.name: BOTTOMLEFT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's bottom left corner.

property.name: TOP
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's top edge.

property.name: CENTER
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's center.

property.name: BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's bottom edge.

property.name: TOPRIGHT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's top right corner.

property.name: RIGHT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's right edge.

property.name: BOTTOMRIGHT
property.shortdesc: Transform relative to the object's bottom right corner.
